title: Convert LinkedIn videos to MP4 with RapidAPI and store in Google Drive & sheets
description:
### üöÄ LinkedIn Video to MP4 Automation with Google Drive & Sheets | RapidAPI Integration

This **n8n workflow** automatically converts LinkedIn video URLs into downloadable MP4 files using the [**LinkedIn Video Downloader API**](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/linkedin-video-downloader3), uploads them to Google Drive with public access, and logs both the original URL and Google Drive link into Google Sheets.  
It leverages the **[LinkedIn Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/linkedin-video-downloader3)** service for fast and secure video extraction.

---

## üìù **Node Explanations (Single-Line)**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **On form submission** ‚Üí Captures LinkedIn video URL from the user via a web form.  
2Ô∏è‚É£ **HTTP Request** ‚Üí Calls **[LinkedIn Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/linkedin-video-downloader3)** to fetch downloadable MP4 links.  
3Ô∏è‚É£ **If** ‚Üí Checks for API errors and routes workflow accordingly.  
4Ô∏è‚É£ **Download mp4** ‚Üí Downloads the MP4 video file from the API response URL.  
5Ô∏è‚É£ **Upload To Google Drive** ‚Üí Uploads the downloaded MP4 file to Google Drive.  
6Ô∏è‚É£ **Google Drive Set Permission** ‚Üí Makes the uploaded file publicly accessible.  
7Ô∏è‚É£ **Google Sheets** ‚Üí Logs successful conversions with LinkedIn URL and sharable Drive link.  
8Ô∏è‚É£ **Wait** ‚Üí Delays execution before logging failed attempts.  
9Ô∏è‚É£ **Google Sheets Append Row** ‚Üí Logs failed video downloads with `N/A` Drive link.  

---
## üìÑ **Google Sheets Columns**

- **URL** ‚Üí Original LinkedIn video URL entered in the form.  
- **Drive_URL** ‚Üí Publicly sharable Google Drive link to the converted MP4 file.  
- *(For failed downloads)* ‚Üí **Drive_URL** will display `N/A`.

---

## üí° **Use Case**

- Automate LinkedIn video downloading and sharing using **[LinkedIn Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/linkedin-video-downloader3)** for **social media managers, marketers, and content creators** without manual file handling.

---

## ‚úÖ **Benefits**

- **Time-saving** (auto-download & upload), **Centralized tracking** in Sheets, **Easy sharing** via Drive links, and **Error logging** for failed downloads‚Äîall powered by **RapidAPI LinkedIn Video Downloader**.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
